Docs.summary: A Class representing a BatchApplicationPackage along with the instance operations that can be performed on it. If you have a you can construct a from an instance of using the GetBatchApplicationPackageResource method. Otherwise you can get one from its parent resource using the GetBatchApplicationPackage method.

Docs.summary: Activates the specified application package. This should be done after the `ApplicationPackage` was created and uploaded. This needs to be done before an `ApplicationPackage` can be used on Pools or Tasks. Request Path: /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.Batch/batchAccounts/{accountName}/applications/{applicationName}/versions/{versionName}/activate Operation Id: ApplicationPackage_Activate
